summary:
This mod adds 3 player camps to skyrim

-Located in-
Falkreith area
Clearspring tarn
Dawnstar Area

They can all be found on the map with the tent symbol and the name (camp)
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 3 player camps to skyrim. This is my 5th mod to be uploaded.

-Located in-
Falkreith area
Clearspring tarn
Dawnstar Area

They can all be found on the map with the tent symbol and the name (camp)

There is an extra playerhome Located at the back of the thalmor embassy. It is a nordic ruin with most of the player essentials such as forge, alchemy tabel, armoury bench ect. This is on the map as a nordic ruin symbol with the name Nord home

these are lore friendly. And will not clash with any mods.
author: Adam Cahill
